messages.en: 4-4 Do Not Panic (part 1)

messages.zh: 没等太久吧。近卫局的会议稍微耽误了点时间。
messages.en: Hope you didn’t wait too long. The Guard Bureau’s meeting took some time.
It’s okay, officer Ch’en.
How’s the condition now?

messages.zh: 罗德岛的侦查小队已经提供了一些有效情报。
messages.en: Rhodes Island’s scout teams have provided some useful intel.

messages.zh: 我总结了一下，从其中选了几条你会感兴趣的。
messages.en: I summed them up, and picked a few ones that you’d be interested in.
Ah……officer Hoshiguma……

messages.zh: 别在意。我也想稍微听一下。
messages.en: Don’t mind. I’d like to have a listen as well.

messages.zh: 继续说吧，阿米娅，没关系的。
messages.en: Go on, Amiya, it’s okay.

messages.zh: 好的。依据罗德岛从部分感染者那里得来的线索——
messages.en: Alright. With the clues that Rhodes Island acquired from some of the Infected——

messages.zh: 侦查小队已经已经查明了龙门平民区内整合运动的一部分窝点。
messages.en: The scout teams have discovered some of the Reunion Movement hideouts within Lungmen.
And then?

messages.zh: 有数支整合运动小队正在谋划针对龙门的防卫力量发动袭击。
messages.en: Several Reunion Movement squads are planning attacks on Lungmen’s defenses.

messages.zh: 我们甚至查到一个整合运动向内渗透的渠道。
messages.en: We even discovered an infiltration channel of Reunion Movement.
Heh, how arrogant.

messages.zh: 龙门近卫局被小看了呢。
messages.en: Lungmen Guard Bureau is really looked down upon huh.

messages.zh: 关于那个切尔诺伯格分城废墟的呢？
messages.en: And about the ruins of that Chernobog sub city?

messages.zh: 龙门近卫局可以提供的情报是，整合运动，包括那个炸弹女，都进入了分城。
messages.en: The information Lungmen Guard Bureau can provide this, Reunion Movement, including that bomb woman, have all entered the sub city.

messages.zh: 然而在那之后，就没有任何动静了。
messages.en: But after that, we haven’t heard anything from them.

messages.zh: 罗德岛有数支侦查小队正同时在分城执行任务。
messages.en: Rhodes Island has several scout teams operating inside the sub city.

messages.zh: 其中确实徘徊着许多整合运动的成员，而原本的居民基本都不知去向。
messages.en: It is indeed filled with wandering Reunion Movement members, and the original inhabitants are nowhere to be seen.

messages.zh: 有一支小队甚至与整合运动发生了三次以上战斗。
messages.en: One squad even had more than three battles with Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 只是，以目前的情报量而言，我们还不能断定这个分城与整合运动的行动究竟有何联系......
messages.en: However, with the current amount of information, we’re still not sure about the connection between this sub city and Reunion Movement’s actions.
……Is that so.

messages.zh: 星熊，帮我去拿下报表。在我桌子左边第三格抽屉。
messages.en: Hoshiguma, get me the form. In the third drawer to the left of my desk.
Now? Alright.
Go on.

messages.zh: 嗯，综上所述......罗德岛建议，应该发动一次联合作战，完全剿灭龙门内部的整合运动。
messages.en: Umm, in conclusion……Rhodes Island proposes a joint operation, to exterminate the Reunion Movement within Lungmen.
No.
Um, okay, I’ll go right now——
……What? Officer Ch’en……?
I said, no.
I……don’t understand……
This is the Guard Bureau’s decision.

messages.zh: 为什么？这对于龙门而言，可是最紧急的状况——
messages.en: Why? For Lungmen, this is the most urgent matter at hand——

messages.zh: 对于龙门最紧急的，是密钥的下落。
messages.en: What’s most urgent for Lungmen, is the whereabout of the key.

messages.zh: 在找到密钥之前，近卫局不能浪费精力。
messages.en: Before finding the key, the Guard Bureau has no resources to waste.
But——
Ah, please wait, let me take a call……
This is Amiya.
Is, is it Amiya?
……! Jessica?
Yes, it’s Jessica here……

messages.zh: 是在进行隐秘行动吗，声音这么轻......
messages.en: Are you in a stealth mission, such low voices……

messages.zh: 我们在分城废墟发现了......整合运动的两个领袖......
messages.en: We found in the sub city ruins……two of Reunion Movement’s leaders……
What?!

messages.zh: 丧家犬就这样灰溜溜的跑回来了？
messages.en: So the stray dog came back with the tail between its legs?

messages.zh: 我可不属于你们这种下等种族哦。
messages.en: Well, I don’t belong to inferior races like you.

messages.zh: ——如果你不是成功完成了任务，我一定让你这张脸上多添一两道疤。
messages.en: ——If you didn’t finish the mission successfully, I’ll add a few more scars to your face.

messages.zh: 麻烦被炸的手足全失的小孩子用嘴来为我化妆，真过意不去呢。
messages.en: Making a child who got all his limbs blown off put on makeup for me with his mouth, I feel so apologetic.
Heh.

messages.zh: 我们两个斗嘴——可是没什么好处的。
messages.en: The two us bickering——won’t do any good.
I’ll admit that for now.
Then, did the fish take the bait?

messages.zh: 一定。就看爱国者那个老家伙能不能把真货带回去了。
messages.en: Certainly. Just depends on whether that old man Patriot can bring the real thing back.

messages.zh: 说起来，你还挺怕这老头的吧？
messages.en: Speaking of which, you’re pretty scared of the old man right?

messages.zh: 我若是再让你多说一个字——
messages.en: If I let you utter one more word——

messages.zh: 哎呀，抱歉。不过在钓上大鱼之前——对吧。
messages.en: Oh my, apologies. But before catching the big fish——right.
Humph. Yeah.
I have to finish those small ones first.
Guests from Rhodes Island, come out.

messages.zh: 在我面前——你们可是藏不住的哦。
messages.en: In my presence——there’s no way for you to hide.
Jessica, don’t!
He’s found us! We have to——
Hmm, just as I thought.
Where did those little kittens come from~

messages.zh: 这里可不是让你随意玩耍的地方哦。
messages.en: This is no place for you to play.
Hey, you.
Aye!!
——Before tearing apart the big fish——
Try out those small fries first.
Hurrah, Hurrahhh!!
Psst!
